fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Better Regulation Agenda and the REFIT Platform work and the submissions and actions by Commission to reduce administrative and regulatory burden.
goals__remit: To promote the interests of European metal-, engineering- and technology based industries in the EU in order to strengthen the competitiveness of the industry for the benefit of European economy and employment and secure fair competitive environment on global markets.
